name: Objectron
description: 3D object pose estimation dataset with annotated videos of common items captured from multiple viewpoints.

metrics.name: ap_3d
metrics.definition: Average precision over 3D bounding boxes and pose alignment

test_method: Predict 3D bounding boxes/poses for each object track and score using official evaluation scripts.
notes: Specify camera calibration usage and frame sampling rate. Some categories have limited annotations.
